short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide posts from specific authors from conversations on the leading German aviation forum 'Pilot und Flugzeug'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You won't need an advanced neural implant to hide the posts that you don't want to see on 'Pilot und Flugzeug' with 'PuF Z-Eye'.
